## About Me


Hi, this is Cathy. 

I am currently a second-year Master of Public Health student at Columbia University, majoring in Epidemiology with a certificate in Biostatistics and Public Health Data Science.

Originally from Zhejiang, China, I am enjoys running, playing tennis, and hiking. My favorite place in New York is Central Park. In my spare time, I also delight in cooking and baking.
